Name: Kumquat (PH)
SaplingDescription: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

SaplingDescriptionLocalization.es: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.ko: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.de: Wächst in 28 Tagen zu einem reifen Kumquatbaum heran. Trägt im Frühling Früchte. Wächst nur, wenn die 8 umliegenden "Felder" leer sind.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.fr: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.hu: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.it: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.ja: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.pt: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.ru: Становится взрослым деревом через 28 дней. Плодоносит весной. Растет только если 8 «клеток» вокруг него не заняты.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.tr: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Kumquat tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
SaplingDescriptionLocalization.zh: 28天成熟为成年金橘树。春天结果。只有在附近8块“地块”都空置的情况下才会成长。
